Posts.Content: I was diagnosed with bone mets December 2001.I was in remission for 3 years and have been on some kind of chemo since. I was just diagnosed with liver mets. Just wanted to know if this is something that can be managed like bone mets.
Posts.Title: Living With Breast Cancer
